name: Loomence – Fashion Commerce Redefined
description: Loomence is a modern fashion e-commerce platform built with Next.js, ShadCN UI, Prisma ORM, and NeonDB (PostgreSQL). Designed to deliver an elegant and performant shopping experience, it features a modular product system, streamlined checkout flow, and responsive UI with a focus on visual aesthetics and usability. The platform is built for scalability and integrates optimized database queries for enhanced performance across devices.

name: FitStat – Personal Training & Progress Tracker
description: FitStat is a comprehensive fitness management app built with a full-stack architecture. Users can hire professional trainers, book fitness classes, and track their daily progress toward personal health goals. The app features a sleek dashboard, interactive goal-setting, and an intuitive booking system. Built with scalability in mind, FitStat offers a responsive design and supports seamless navigation across devices.

name: Lodgio – Seamless Hotel Booking Experience
description: Lodgio is an end-to-end hotel booking platform tailored for effortless travel planning. Built with a robust React-based frontend, it enables users to browse accommodations, view detailed property galleries, and make secure bookings. The platform emphasizes clarity and convenience, offering dynamic search filters and mobile-first design optimized for a wide range of devices and screen sizes.

name: Visa Glide – Effortless Visa Applications
description: Visa Glide is a digital visa support platform that simplifies complex travel documentation. With a responsive interface and clean form design, users can apply for visas, upload necessary documents, and track application progress in real time. Built using React and a full-stack backend, the app reduces manual overhead and ensures transparency through the entire application cycle.

name: Lingo Fox – Interactive Language Learning
description: Lingo Fox is a lightweight and engaging platform for language learners, offering intuitive lessons and interactive exercises. Built with a responsive React frontend, it supports a distraction-free learning environment and includes gamified elements like progress tracking and mini-quizzes. The app is ideal for beginners looking to build vocabulary and conversational skills with a fun, easy-to-use interface.
